mapper.select: SELECT info.id, info.`name`, info.`describe`, info.max_total, info.cost, info.image, info.start_time, info.end_time,info.create_time, info.group_id, IF(g.group_name IS NULL,"未分组",g.group_name) as groupName, COUNT(bind.id) AS count, SUM( IF ( bind.deleted = 0, bind.cost, 0 ) ) AS costTotal FROM sign_info info LEFT JOIN user_sign_info bind ON bind.sign_id = info.id LEFT JOIN user_group g on g.id = info.group_id WHERE info.deleted = 0 GROUP BY info.id ORDER BY info.create_time DESC

select SUM(a.count1)as week,SUM(a.count2) as month ,SUM(a.cost) as cost from ( SELECT COUNT(bind.user_id) AS count1, 0 as count2 ,0 as cost FROM user_sign_info bind WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), 1 ) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1) union all SELECT 0 as count1, COUNT(bind.user_id) AS count2 ,0 as cost FROM user_sign_info bind WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') union ALL select 0 as count1,0 as count2, bind.cost from user_sign_info bind
)a
SELECT COUNT(bind.user_id) AS count FROM user_sign_info bind WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d'), 1 ) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1)
SELECT COUNT(bind.user_id) AS count FROM user_sign_info bind WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
